column5: Has anyone come across a Suspending rattlin rougue that is in stock around the GTA. I am looking for the colour of Bream or Golden Bass. I also think it might be called Starburst. The back is dark navy blue with bright flex or spec and has an orange belly. I tried looking a bass pro, no luck. Does anyone know if they are discontinue?

Thanks for the link but I still couldn't find the colour that I was looking for. I did manage to find my old 2006 BPS catalog. Page 255-Colour #23,26 Looking for it in the suspending. It's a killer for bass on couch and simcoe. Nice looking lure with alot of bright flex and shine on the back.
Tightline in Pickering sells rogues, and so does Gagnon sports in oshawa... i don't know about the exact colour that you are looking for, but i know they both sell them

check that link again, and instead of clicking on the suspending models, click on the "rattlin' rogues" link, i think the colour you are looking for is the very first model. by the way, the rattlin' rogues also suspend.
